name: The Flash
description: After being struck by lightning, Barry Allen wakes up from his coma to discover he's been given the power of super speed, becoming a superhero, The Flash, fighting crime in Central City.

name: Game of Thrones
description: While a civil war brews between several noble families in Westeros, the children of the former rulers of the land attempt to rise to power.

name: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.
